author: Deccan
title: Gionee launches new ultra-budget smartphone
text:
Deccan Chronicle | September 23, 2015, 15.28 pm Pioneer P3S runs on Android 5.1 Lollipop operating system Gionee has added another phone to its P series of smartphones - Pioneer P3S in India. Gionee Pioneer P3S is powered by 1.3GHz quad-core processor and sports a 11.43cm (4.5-inch) FWVGA display. Pioneer P3S runs on the advanced Android 5.1Lollipop and the latest Amigo 3.1 operating system and a specially designed Music player.
An 'extreme mode' on device is also said to enable the last 10 pe rcent of battery power to potentially last for some more time. Beautifully designed the smartphone comes with metal plating bright lines which brings out a tight body shape of the device. Gionee P3S has a 5MP rear snapper and 0.3MP front-facing camera option. It also comes with the ‘Face beauty’ feature to help you capture a better selfie image. The Gionee P3S handset also offers an in-built 16GB memory and comes with 1GB of RAM. The Dual SIM, Dual standby supported P3S is backed by a 2000mAh battery to provide an exceptionally lasting talk time and multimedia usage.
Gionee P3S is available in four colours - White, Grey, Red and Gold and is priced at MOP Rs 5,999.
